unrestrict/link.description: Unrestrict a hoster link and get a new unrestricted link

torrents/addTorrent.description: Add a torrent file to download, return a 201 HTTP code

torrents/addMagnet.description: Add a magnet link to download, return a 201 HTTP code

/torrents/selectFiles/.description: Add a magnet link to download, return a 201 HTTP code - url must be appended with id from addMagnet or addTorrent
